    • Constructor Detail

      • PromotionalPackage

        public PromotionalPackage(java.lang.String name,
                          double price,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> itemList)
        Create a promotional package with name, price, description and a list of menu item
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the promotional package
        price - the price of the promotional package
        description - the description of the promotional package
        itemList - the list of the menu item in the promotional package

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public void print(boolean detail)
        Print the detail of the promotional package
        Parameters:
        detail - whether to print all the detail of the promotional package detail == true: print name, price, price, description and all the menu item it contains detail == false: print the name of the promotional package only

      • update

        public void update(MenuItem menuItem)
        Receive the update from a menu item which the promotional package contains This method is called when a menu item (which the promotional package contains) is deleted to remove that menu item from its containing list
        Parameters:
        menuItem - the reference to the menu item sending the notify

      • update

        public void update(MenuItem menuItem,
                   MenuItem newItem)
        Receive the update from a menu item which the promotional contains This method is called when a menu item (which the promotional package contains) is replaced with another menu item To replace the old menu item with the new one
        Parameters:
        menuItem - the menu item to be replaced
        newItem - the new menu item
